FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Employment 2: Servant Housing
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Servants are a delight to have and more places to house them means you can hire more! +4 max workers. +4 overmax workers. +$5 worker cost. 250 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Employment 4: Worker Bots
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Put robots to work doing the more mundane tasks around the colony so the people can be put to work elsewhere. +10 max workers. +7 overmax workers. 400 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Employment 5: Union Offices
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: A central building for local unions to operate out of. It's amazing how much happier and willing to work people are when you treat them well. -.75 unrest per day. +.75 happiness and loyalty per day. +$50 worker cost. +10 max and overmax workers. 1000 silver per tax period upkeep.
